attributes.action: Introduce random drug tests on MP's and members of the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details:
Many public and private organisaitons already demand that their staff are subject to random drug and alcohol testing.
The same should apply to the goverment of this country.
All test results should be made public immediately and anyone failing the test should be suspended from the government. 
Repeat offenders should be dismissed.
attributes.background: If you are unfit to drive because of drink or drugs then you are unfit to run the country.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
